data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yasunaga, Tomohide, Yamada, Kazutaka, Artchawakom, Taksin (2014): Additional records and descriptions of the ant-mimetic plant bug genus Pilophorus from Thailand (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae: Pilophorini). Zootaxa 3795 (1): 1-15, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3795.1.1
